title: Trailblazer League/Areas/The Fremennik Provinces

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Fremennik Provinces Area covers the entire Fremennik Province including the Fremennik islands, Lunar Isle, and Weiss. Underground areas and instanced areas with an entrance in the area are also included. Magical barriers prevent access to Kandarin via the bridge south of Rellekka.

content:
The Fremennik Provinces Area covers the entire Fremennik Province including the Fremennik islands, Lunar Isle, and Weiss. Underground areas and instanced areas with an entrance in the area are also included. Magical barriers prevent access to Kandarin via the bridge south of Rellekka.

Contents

  • 1 Overview of area
    • 1.1 Notable settlements
    • 1.2 Restricted travel
    • 1.3 Notable combat-related activities
    • 1.4 Notable non-combat activities
    • 1.5 Notable shops
    • 1.6 Slayer tasks added
  • 2 Unlocks
    • 2.1 Quests
    • 2.2 Achievement diary tasks
  • 3 Notable drops

Overview of area[edit | edit source]

Notable settlements[edit | edit source]

  • Keldagrim
  • Lunar Isle
  • Miscellania & Etceteria
  • Neitiznot & Jatizso
  • Rellekka
  • The Island of Stone
  • The Mountain Camp
  • The Pirates' Cove
  • Ungael
  • Waterbirth Island
  • Weiss (Requires completion of Making Friends with My Arm)

Restricted travel[edit | edit source]

The following travel options are restricted unless the appropriate area is unlocked:

  • The log shortcut leading to the Fremennik Province north of Sinclair Manor
  • The rubble separating the Fremennik Province and the Death Plateau
  • The cave entrance in the tunnel leading to Keldagrim that leads to the bottom of Trollweiss mountain
  • The basalt rock agility shortcut leading from the Lighthouse to the Barbarian Outpost

Notable combat-related activities[edit | edit source]

  • Basilisk knights
  • Dagannoth Kings
  • Rellekka Slayer Cave
  • Waterbirth Island Dungeon
  • Vorkath (Fremennik Region does not provide the means to create Antifire potion or Antivenom.)

Notable non-combat activities[edit | edit source]

  • Blast Furnace, operated by Dwarves
    • Ice gloves will be placed in your bank upon region claim and can be reclaimed from the Leagues Tutor if lost
  • Kingdom Management
  • Penguin Agility Course
  • Rellekka house portal
  • Rellekka Rooftop Course
  • Astral Altar
  • Keldagrim Stonemason Construction shop

Notable shops[edit | edit source]

  • Mawnis Burowgar
  • Skulgrimen's Battle Gear
  • Baba Yaga's Magic Shop.
  • Moon Clan Fine Clothes.

Slayer tasks added[edit | edit source]

Unlocking the Fremennik Province will add the following tasks to your slayer list:

  • Basilisks
  • Cockatrice
  • Dagannoth
  • Jellies
  • Kurasks
  • Turoth

Unlocks[edit | edit source]

The following quests and achievement diary tasks are automatically completed after unlocking the area.

Quests[edit | edit source]

  • Horror from the Deep
    • Alfred Grimhand's Barcrawl
      • Scorpion Catcher
  • Mountain Daughter
  • Family Crest
  • Ghosts Ahoy
  • Dragon Slayer II
    • Legends' Quest
      • Family Crest
      • Heroes' Quest
        • Shield of Arrav
        • Lost City
        • Merlin's Crystal
        • Dragon Slayer I
      • Underground Pass
        • Biohazard
          • Plague City
      • Waterfall Quest
    • Dream Mentor
      • Lunar Diplomacy
        • The Fremennik Trials
        • Lost City
        • Rune Mysteries
        • Shilo Village
          • Jungle Potion
      • Eadgar's Ruse
        • Druidic Ritual
        • Troll Stronghold
          • Death Plateau
    • A Tail of Two Cats
      • Icthlarin's Little Helper
        • Gertrude's Cat
    • Animal Magnetism
      • Ernest the Chicken
      • Priest in Peril
      • The Restless Ghost
    • Ghosts Ahoy
      • Priest in Peril
      • The Restless Ghost
    • Bone Voyage
      • The Dig Site
    • Client of Kourend

Achievement diary tasks[edit | edit source]

Automatically completed diary tasks upon area unlock
Fremennik Diary
Easy Tasks
  • Enter the Troll Stronghold
Medium Tasks
  • Mine some gold at the Arzinian Mine
  • Travel to the Snowy Hunter Area via Eagle
Hard Tasks
  • Teleport to Trollheim
Elite Tasks
  • Kill each of the God Wars Dungeon Generals
  • Slay a spiritual mage within the God Wars Dungeon

rawContent:
'''The Fremennik Provinces Area''' covers the entire [[Fremennik Province]] including the Fremennik islands, [[Lunar Isle]], and [[Weiss]]. Underground areas and [[instance|instanced areas]] with an entrance in the area are also included. Magical barriers prevent access to [[Kandarin]] via the bridge south of [[Rellekka]].

==Overview of area==
===Notable settlements===
* [[Keldagrim]]
* [[Lunar Isle]]
* [[Miscellania]] & [[Etceteria]]
* [[Neitiznot]] & [[Jatizso]]
* [[Rellekka]]
* The [[Island of Stone]]
* The [[Mountain Camp]]
* The [[Pirates' Cove]]
* [[Ungael]]
* [[Waterbirth Island]]
* [[Weiss]] (Requires completion of [[Making Friends with My Arm]])

===Restricted travel===
The following travel options are restricted unless the appropriate area is unlocked:
* The log shortcut leading to the Fremennik Province north of Sinclair Manor
* The rubble separating the Fremennik Province and the [[Death Plateau]]
* The cave entrance in the tunnel leading to Keldagrim that leads to the bottom of Trollweiss mountain
* The basalt rock agility shortcut leading from the [[Lighthouse]] to the [[Barbarian Outpost]]

===Notable combat-related activities===
* [[Basilisk knights]]
* [[Dagannoth Kings]]
* [[Rellekka Slayer Cave]]
* [[Waterbirth Island Dungeon]]
* [[Vorkath]] (Fremennik Region does not provide the means to create [[Antifire potion]] or [[Antivenom]].)

===Notable non-combat activities===
* [[Blast Furnace]], operated by [[Dwarves]]
** [[Ice gloves]] will be placed in your bank upon region claim and can be reclaimed from the [[Leagues Tutor]] if lost
* [[Kingdom Management]]
* [[Penguin Agility Course]]
* [[Rellekka]] house portal
* [[Rellekka Rooftop Course]]
*[[Astral Altar]]
* [[Keldagrim Stonemason]] Construction shop

===Notable shops===
* [[Mawnis Burowgar]]
* [[Skulgrimen's Battle Gear]]
* [[Baba Yaga's Magic Shop.]]
* [[Moon Clan Fine Clothes.]]

===Slayer tasks added===
Unlocking the Fremennik Province will add the following tasks to your slayer list:
* [[Basilisks]]
* [[Cockatrice]]
* [[Dagannoth]]
* [[Jellies]]
* [[Kurasks]]
* [[Turoth]]

==Unlocks==
The following quests and achievement diary tasks are automatically completed after unlocking the area.
===Quests===
